name: Denise
bio:
I'm passionate about creating beautiful, delightful, and functional experiences that are accessible to anyone. Nothing makes me happier than seeing people enjoy using the sites and products I've designed.

I'm always focused on how to deliver value to customer and designing solutions that are functional, feasible and delightful.

I'm always open to learning about new opportunities to grow.
likes: Blending business value with customer satisfaction
Analyzing how people use products and services
